subject: Build adaptive threshold learning
description:
Learn optimal complexity thresholds from DQ scores:
- Track DQ score outcomes per complexity tier (fast/balanced/deep)
- Calculate tier effectiveness: avg DQ score per tier over time
- Implement threshold adjustment algorithm:
  - If deep tier DQ < balanced DQ: raise deepThreshold
  - If fast tier DQ > balanced DQ: lower balancedThreshold
- Weekly recalibration with decay factor
- Integrate with existing DQ scoring system (~/.claude/kernel/dq-scores.jsonl)
- Add `getAdaptiveThresholds()` API

This creates a feedback loop: routing decisions → DQ scores → threshold adjustment
